

```{r}
library(mosaic)
```

```{r}
day_data <- read.csv("./Bike-Sharing-Dataset/day.csv", header=TRUE)
summary(day_data)
```
```{r}
dteday <- day_data[c('dteday','cnt')]
summary(dteday)
```
```{r}
numeric_data <- day_data %>% select(-dteday)
summary(numeric_data)
```


```{r}
cor(numeric_data)[,15]
```
```{r}
pairs(numeric_data[c('instant','yr','temp','atemp','casual','registered','cnt')],pch=19)
```


```{r}
model <- lm(cnt~temp, data=numeric_data)
summary(model)
```

```{r}
plot(cnt ~temp, data=numeric_data, col="blue")
abline(model,lwd=3,col="red")
```

```{r}
plot(model,1)
```


```{r}
plot(model,2)
```

```{r}
plot(model,3)

```
